name: spice of life blanket
notes:
<big>spice of life crochet along</big> 
**#spiceoflifecal**

this spice of life blanket pattern was originally released in parts for the cherry heart and black sheep wools cal.

> now available as a pdf with bonus content: **[spice of
> life remixed][3]**

this is the first of the 'spicy' cal blankets, to find the second blanket, see '[a spicier life][1]'.

skill - easy/intermediate 
this pattern is intended to help someone who has learnt the basics of crochet and is now looking to move increase their crochet confidence. this pattern starts with the basics and progresses through to intermediate stitches and combinations. it is a great way to get used to working from written patterns.

yarn 
a total of 2,380m/2,600 yards of dk weight yarn in 13 different colours as follows:

you’ll need 180 yards (approx) in 13 colours for the main blanket 
you’ll also need an extra 180 yards (approx) in your chosen border colour 
(based on the original rico yarn pack.)

[cherry heart boutique at black sheep wools][2]

for more yarn details see the link below.


free pattern includes:
- a full written pattern with clear instructions in uk or us terms
- social media and spice of life facebook group links
- links to spice of life page for original blog post tips

see **[spice of life remixed for the full pdf version][3]**, with more help and bonus content.
